replies.body:
> I get chat banned for trying to get this troll banned?

Do you know how you flag someone to be reviewed? You shut up and report them after the game. You don't derail the game even more for your team. If you got a chat restriction, it was not from just one game, you have a history of negative chat.

Literally everything you said in chat was to harass a teammate. That's not what chat is for. If you don't like someone's behavior, report them after the game. Flaming, arguing, and threatening doesn't help.

Yeah, they consider it harassment when you try to get everyone in a game to gang up on one person, regardless of the situation. The fact is, theres literally NO reason to do that. One report is all it takes for a report to be reviewed. They dont go "oh 4 people reported this person so they MUST have done something wrong". I mean, premades exist. So doing it that way would be absolutely stupid. Thus, calling for reports is against the rules as it serves no purpose other than to antagonize a player. Report them, and let Riot handle the rest. You dont need to get a mob assembled to report someone.

Besides, you also called everyone trash. Insulting players is against the rules as well.
Don't be toxic. Doesn't matter what others do, just don't be toxic.
